overview:
Ron Kornfeld is the founder of xl.io, a product strategy firm with significant expertise in business development and negotiation, particularly for small technology companies seeking opportunities with large ones.

He was the founder of NimbleSource, a privately-funded venture consultancy in Seattle, WA. NimbleSource provided strategic consulting with an emphasis on accelerating revenues for early stage ventures. The firm also internally developed companies for launch.

Prior to founding NimbleSource, Ron was on the founding teams of a number of companies, including PersonalGrid, SchoolSoft Corporation (now DreamBox), Normandy Partners, Harmonetrix, Cognisoft, XactLabs, and was also in management roles at MCI.

For five years he was a board member of the Washington Technology Industry Association, is founder of dental healthcare technology innovator PredictDent, and serves as an advisor to a number of private technology corporations.
